name: panda-crm-sync
description: Bidirectional sync between Salesforce and Panda CRM

scripts.deploy: npm run build && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name panda-crm-sync --zip-file fileb://dist/function.zip
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cd dist && cp -r ../src/* . && cp ../package.json . && npm install --production && zip -r function.zip .
